segments.text: Seeing the water flood the floor makes my heart race with dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman doesn’t notice this disaster brewing at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s as if she’s completely wrapped up in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the children are caught in their little scheme, which is both adorable and reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s body is stretched towards the cookie jar, and I feel a pang of anxiety for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then there’s the girl, standing there with her palm out, so eager.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a mix of amusement and worry as I think about what could happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR
